TermDesc:
- Syntony Field lasts for 25s.
- When the Syntony Field is generated, all targets within its effective range take Fusion DMG, considered Resonance Liberation DMG.
- Continuously restores HP for all nearby Resonators in the team within the Syntony Field, triggered once every 3s.
- Increases the Off-Tune Buildup Rate of all nearby Resonators in the team within the Syntony Field by 50%.
- Enhances the resistance to interruption of all nearby Resonators in the team within the Syntony Field.
